ai-tha-ap225:1.1_0: “I used to have a small sea
ai-tha-ap225:1.2_0: “In the wilderness, I’m sitting in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap225:2.2_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap225:2.3_0: In the world with its gods,
ai-tha-ap225:4.1_0: all of them are your enemy;
ai-tha-ap225:4.3_0: I’ll make my limbs with my hands,
ai-tha-ap225:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap225:5.4_0: this is the lump of meat.
ai-tha-ap225:6.1_0: have been set out from here.
ai-tha-ap225:6.3_0: a big bull of a great man,
ai-tha-ap225:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Two verses.
ai-tha-ap225:9.1_0: Third: the third section for recitation on the Elder Two-treasures,
ai-tha-ap225:9.2_0: the tenth section for recitation is finished.
